alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 8:40AM PST until January 06 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow, with spotty sleet or freezing rain. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches, with spotty ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...South Washington Cascades. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow level rising, from 2000 this morning to 4000 feet later this afternoon, and to 5500 feet tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
